name: WATER
description: As a representative work of emerging community economic tokens, Water is meant to inherit the spirit of DeFI, restore a pure land to the currency circle, and reshape the new future of decentralized finance. Water was initiated by the Layer3 community and promoted by the New Pangu community in conjunction with the 10 major DeFi mainstream communities. It has strong ecological applications and is positioned as the first ecological token of the full ecological industry cluster in the Web3 era.
